campfire.action.rest.label: Rest
campfire.action.rest.tooltip:
Ending your turn by <style="status">Resting</style> allows you to get rid of your <style="wound">wounds</style> and <style="value">Unwanted</style> cards.

<style="status">Discard</style> any <style="value">Non-Wound</style> card and <style="value">as many</style> <style="wound">wounds</style> as you want.

This does not <style="status">Heal</style> your wounds, they just end up in your discard pile and will show up at the next Day/Night cycle.

You want to use this action <style="status">sparingly</style> as you might only have a <style="value">limited number of turns</style> per Day/Night depending on Scenario configuration.
campfire.action.recover.label: Recover
campfire.action.recover.tooltip:
Ending your turn by <style="status">Recovering</style> is a penalty when you only have <style="wound">wounds</style> in <style="value">Hand</style>.

Select how many <style="wound">Wounds</style> to <style="status">Discard</style>. You will draw back that many Cards (up to hand limit).

This does not <style="status">Heal</style> your wounds, they just end up in your discard pile and will show up at the next Day/Night cycle.
campfire.action.sleep.label: Sleep
campfire.action.sleep.tooltip:
<style="status">Sleeping</style> switches to the next Day or Night cycle. <style="value">All</style> your Cards are discarded and reshuffled and a new hand is drawn.
The Ambient Mana, Followers and Blessings will all be refreshed
campfire.action.continue.label: Explore
campfire.action.continue.tooltip: This <style="status">Continues</style> your journey bringing you back to <style="value">Exploring</style> the Map.
campfire.action.end_turn.label: End Turn
campfire.action.end_turn.tooltip: This will <style="status">Start</style> a new turn, drawing cards back to hand size. You will also receive any potential <style="value">Reward</style> associated with the location you are at on the Map (if any).

campfire.sleep.rest.confirm.title: End of Round <style="status">Announced</style>
campfire.sleep.rest.confirm.content:
Since End of Round was announced, after <style="status">Resting</style> the current Day/Night round will end and start a new Round.

Your Cards in Hand will be <style="status">Discarded</style> and Reshuffled, your Followers and Blessings will be <style="status">Refreshed</style>.

Move to the next Round by Resting?

Your Cards in Hand will be <style="status">Discarded</style> and Reshuffled, your Followers and Blessings will be <style="status">Refreshed</style>.

campfire.sleep.confirm.accept.label: Next Round
campfire.sleep.confirm.content.with_bann:
Some of your Followers have <style="value">Blessings</style> attached.

If you end the Round now, you will have to wait for the <style="value">End of the Next Round</style> before you can retreive those Blessings in your hand if you want to use their powerful Advanced effect instead.

To detach the Blessings, in the Followers tab click on the <style="sacrifice">Delete</style> button next to the Blessing to Detach.
